item.title: Tiered Subnet Calculator in Terraform
item.description: Update Dec 17th 2022: Things have changed since TF v0.13 like the resulting order for a list of objects with for. So this article is outdated and the caclulator doesn’t work as described anymore if you’re using a more recent version of Terraform. I’ll try to update article when I can. I’ve been thinking about adding support for building tiered subnets of any valid size for the next iteration of the Dynamic VPC Module.
